Instance Method# rotated(by:around:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 9.0+

```
func rotated(
    by rotation: Rotation3DFloat,
    around pivot: Point3DFloat
) -> Point3DFloat
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/Point3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-5xwwi#parameters)

`rotation`The rotation.

`pivot`The center of rotation.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/Point3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-5xwwi#return-value)

A point that’s rotated by the specified rotation.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/Point3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-5xwwi#discussion)

Returns a point that’s rotated by a rotation around a specified pivot.
